participant_1.background:
I love eating my mom's cooking because it reminds me of home.
I am a reliable and hardworking individual who enjoys spending time with my family and friends, but also values alone time to relax.
I'm looking for a place to move with a climate that's better for my skin.
i like to exercise.
my dad was a cop until he was killed.

participant_2.background:
I practice karate in the basement of my mansion.
i have danced since i was two.
i came from japan to teach high school over 10 years ago.
i was raised by two mothers.
I don't own a car because I like to walk or ride my bike.

content.text: Miyako, that is a beautiful name. Where are you from?
I am from Japan. I came to the United States to teach high school over 10 years ago.
That is so cool! I have always wanted to visit Japan. What do you like most about living here?
I like that there are so many different cultures here. I also like that there are so many opportunities for people to pursue their dreams.
That is true. I think that is one of the best things about the US. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to practice karate, dance, and spend time with my friends.
Karate! That is awesome. I have always wanted to learn karate. Do you teach karate classes?
Yes, I teach karate classes at my local community center.
That is so cool! I might have to come check out your class sometime.
You are welcome to come anytime!
